title: YARD / CUNOESSE
description:
Talk to Cunoesse to find out she's a girl.

"I have nothing interesting say, talk to Cuno!"

Or approach her from the backyard to catch her off-guard and have something-resembling an actual dialogue with her.

dialogueTree.title: Cunoesse: "The girl is ignoring you. It's like..."
dialogueTree.text: The girl is ignoring you. It's like you don't exist at all as far as she's concerned.

dialogueTree.title: Cunoesse: ""Cuno, the pig's getting pretty clo..."
dialogueTree.text: "Cuno, the pig's getting pretty close to me," she hisses. "Come to snuff my shit out, I think."

links.title: You: "Take one step closer."
links.text: Take one step closer.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Looks like it's time for me to go,..."
links.text: "Looks like it's time for me to go, Cuno. Pig's come to take me in."

links.title: Half Light: "She means it. The fear is real."
links.text: She means it. The fear is real.

links.title: You: ""I just want to ask you some questi..."
links.text: "I just want to ask you some questions." (Take another step closer.)

links.title: Cunoesse: ""I'm going away for a long, long ti..."
links.text: "I'm going away for a long, long time, Cuno. Going away for life!"

links.title: Cuno: ""What's going on there? Fuck are yo..."
links.text: "What's going on there? Fuck are you trying to pull, pig?"

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Cunoesse: ""Trying to sneak up on me again? Tr..."
dialogueTree.text: "Trying to sneak up on me again? Trying to snuff me out? Get away, pig!"

dialogueTree.title: Cunoesse: ""Are you trying to sneak up on me?"..."
dialogueTree.text: "Are you trying to sneak up on me?" she whispers. "Come to slit my throat? In my sleep?"

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Apparently, she doesn't like people..."
links.text: Apparently, she doesn't like people standing behind her back.

links.title: Logic: "Logic error! She's not sleeping rig..."
links.text: Logic error! She's not sleeping right now.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Pig's come to take me out?" Her vo..."
links.text: "Pig's come to take me out?" Her voice becomes almost inaudible. "Trying to snuff me out?"

links.title: Half Light: "If anything, you're afraid she'll t..."
links.text: If anything, you're afraid she'll take *you* out one day...

links.title: You: ""No, why would you even say that?""
links.text: "No, why would you even say that?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Then why are you sneaking up on me..."
links.text: "Then why are you sneaking up on me like that? It's not a good idea to scare me, pig. Not a good idea *at all*."

links.title: You: ""Are you sleeping right now?""
links.text: "Are you sleeping right now?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Don't get fucking clever with me,..."
links.text: "Don't get fucking clever with me, pig... you think you're so clever..." She hisses.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry for sneaking up on you."..."
links.text: "I'm sorry for sneaking up on you." [Leave.]

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Fägäri...." she whispers as you're..."
links.text: "Fägäri...." she whispers as you're sneaking away. "Look at the ass on that."

dialogueTree.title: Cunoesse: ""I'll die before I squeal, pig." Sh..."
dialogueTree.text: "I'll die before I squeal, pig." She hides behind the fence.

links.title: You: ""Listen, child. The smell is so bad..."
links.text: "Listen, child. The smell is so bad that I threw up, and I was wondering..."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Stay away from me, pig -- you don'..."
links.text: "Stay away from me, pig -- you don't wanna see what happens when you corner me."

links.title: You: ""What are those strange words you u..."
links.text: "What are those strange words you use, girl?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""I come from the woods, *kyttä vitt..."
links.text: "I come from the woods, *kyttä vittu*... You don't wanna go there with me... you don't wanna see what I've seen."

links.title: Cuno: ""Don't be traumatizing her. Get the..."
links.text: "Don't be traumatizing her. Get the fuck out of here!"

links.title: You: ""Hey, kid!""
links.text: "Hey, kid!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""What's this... kid shit? Fucking m..."
links.text: "What's this... kid shit? Fucking mind games..." She puts her finger to her temple. "I'd rather die than squeal!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Get the fuck out of her face! You..."
links.text: "Get the fuck out of her face! You got something, talk to me!"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "So it's a girl... interesting."
links.text: So it's a girl... interesting.

links.title: You: ""Child, converse with me.""
links.text: "Child, converse with me."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Murder was the case, was the case,..."
links.text: "Murder was the case, was the case, they gave me..." She has almost vanished behind the fence. Only the top of her hat remains.

links.title: You: ""You there, behind the fence!""
links.text: "You there, behind the fence!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""You don't wanna fuck with me -- I..."
links.text: "You don't wanna fuck with me -- I got my hands bloody." The hat drops even lower. "I'm not here, pig. You're not seeing this."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "You can still see the top of her ha..."
links.text: You can still see the top of her hat from behind the fence.

links.title: You: "Walk away. [Leave.]"
links.text: Walk away. [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Cunoesse: ""Can't believe you missed... We wer..."
dialogueTree.text: "Can't believe you missed... We were so close, you and I... fucking noodle fingers! Can't you see I'm *IMMORTAL* now!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""I'm never getting out." She touche..."
links.text: "I'm never getting out." She touches her face and then her body. "I'm in it for life now. I'm doing life with you pigs! Fucking sweaty pigs. Fucking fisher-people."

links.title: You: ""What do you mean *fisher-people*?""
links.text: "What do you mean *fisher-people*?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Fucking *näkki*...""
links.text: "Fucking *näkki*..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Come. We need to go now." The lieu..."
links.text: "Come. We need to go now." The lieutenant puts his hand on your shoulder.

links.title: You: ""No, Kim! I wanna hear about the *n..."
links.text: "No, Kim! I wanna hear about the *näkki*!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Merrow...""
links.text: "Merrow..."

links.title: You: ""Okay, okay... I'm good. We're done..."
links.text: "Okay, okay... I'm good. We're done here." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""What does *näkki* mean?""
links.text: "What does *näkki* mean?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Merrow...""
links.text: "Merrow..."

links.title: You: ""Okay, okay... we're done here." [L..."
links.text: "Okay, okay... we're done here." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Cunoesse: ""Can't believe you didn't take the..."
dialogueTree.text: "Can't believe you didn't take the shot. Fucking coward... waved your gun like a clown. Next time you point that shit at me, you better take the shot."

links.title: Empathy: "She continues to be *here* -- all d..."
links.text: She continues to be *here* -- all due to you being a coward and not shooting her. The contempt is thick enough to cut through with a knife.

links.title: Half Light: "This kid is way, way worse than the..."
links.text: This kid is way, way worse than the other one.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Her knuckles have turned white, hol..."
links.text: Her knuckles have turned white, holding on to that fence. She's been here for days, seething.

dialogueTree.title: Cunoesse: "A breeze whistles slightly through..."
dialogueTree.text: A breeze whistles slightly through the fence. "Pig broke out of the pigpen. Fuck off before you shit on everything!"

links.title: You: ""Is it you? Are you the Child of th..."
links.text: "Is it you? Are you the Child of the Big Sea the wind told me to find?"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Pig wants to know who I am? I'm th..."
links.text: "Pig wants to know who I am? I'm the biggest FUCK YOU of your entire life -- go on and get, piggy!"
